20 #ifndef TILEDARRAY_DIST_EVAL_BINARY_EVAL_H__INCLUDED
21 #define TILEDARRAY_DIST_EVAL_BINARY_EVAL_H__INCLUDED

23 #include <TiledArray/dist_eval/dist_eval.h>
24 #include <TiledArray/zero_tensor.h>

26 namespace TiledArray {
27 namespace detail {
28 
30 
37 template <typename Left, typename Right, typename Op, typename Policy>
38 class BinaryEvalImpl : public DistEvalImpl<typename Op::result_type, Policy>,
39  public std::enable_shared_from_this<
40  BinaryEvalImpl<Left, Right, Op, Policy> > {
41  public:
42  typedef BinaryEvalImpl<Left, Right, Op, Policy>
43  BinaryEvalImpl_;
44  typedef DistEvalImpl<typename Op::result_type, Policy>
45  DistEvalImpl_;
46  typedef typename DistEvalImpl_::TensorImpl_
47  TensorImpl_;
48  typedef Left left_type;
49  typedef Right right_type;
50  typedef typename DistEvalImpl_::size_type size_type;
51  typedef typename DistEvalImpl_::range_type range_type;
52  typedef typename DistEvalImpl_::shape_type shape_type;
53  typedef typename DistEvalImpl_::pmap_interface
54  pmap_interface;
55  typedef
56  typename DistEvalImpl_::trange_type trange_type;
57  typedef typename DistEvalImpl_::value_type value_type;
58  typedef
59  typename DistEvalImpl_::eval_type eval_type;
60  typedef Op op_type;
61 
62  using std::enable_shared_from_this<BinaryEvalImpl_>::shared_from_this;
63 
64  private:
65  left_type left_;
66  right_type right_;
67  op_type op_;
68 
69  public:
71 
80  BinaryEvalImpl(const left_type& left, const right_type& right, World& world,
81  const trange_type& trange, const shape_type& shape,
82  const std::shared_ptr<pmap_interface>& pmap,
83  const Permutation& perm, const op_type& op)
84  : DistEvalImpl_(world, trange, shape, pmap, perm),
85  left_(left),
86  right_(right),
87  op_(op) {
88  TA_ASSERT(left.trange() == right.trange());
89  }
90 
91  virtual ~BinaryEvalImpl() {}
92 
94 
99  virtual Future<value_type> get_tile(size_type i) const {
100  TA_ASSERT(TensorImpl_::is_local(i));
101  TA_ASSERT(!TensorImpl_::is_zero(i));
102 
103  const size_type source_index = DistEvalImpl_::perm_index_to_source(i);
104  const ProcessID source =
105  left_.owner(source_index); // Left and right
106  // should have the same owner
107 
108  const madness::DistributedID key(DistEvalImpl_::id(), i);
109  return TensorImpl_::world().gop.template recv<value_type>(source, key);
110  }
111 
113 
117  virtual void discard_tile(size_type i) const { get_tile(i); }
118 
119  private:
121 
122 #ifdef TILEDARRAY_HAS_CUDA
123  template <typename L, typename R, typename U = value_type>
127  std::enable_if_t<!detail::is_cuda_tile<U>::value, void> eval_tile(
128  const size_type i, L left, R right) {
129  DistEvalImpl_::set_tile(i, op_(left, right));
130  }
131 
135  template <typename L, typename R, typename U = value_type>
136  std::enable_if_t<detail::is_cuda_tile<U>::value, void> eval_tile(
137  const size_type i, L left, R right) {
138  // TODO avoid copy the Op object
139  auto result_tile =
140  madness::add_cuda_task(DistEvalImpl_::world(), op_, left, right);
141  DistEvalImpl_::set_tile(i, result_tile);
142  }
143 #else
144  template <typename L, typename R>
148  void eval_tile(const size_type i, L left, R right) {
149  DistEvalImpl_::set_tile(i, op_(left, right));
150  }
151 #endif
152 
159  virtual int internal_eval() {
160  // Evaluate child tensors
161  left_.eval();
162  right_.eval();
163 
164  // Task function argument types
165  typedef typename std::conditional<
166  op_type::left_is_consumable, typename left_type::value_type,
167  const typename left_type::value_type>::type& left_argument_type;
168  typedef typename std::conditional<
169  op_type::right_is_consumable, typename right_type::value_type,
170  const typename right_type::value_type>::type& right_argument_type;
171 
172  size_type task_count = 0ul;
173 
174  // Construct local iterator
175  TA_ASSERT(left_.pmap() == right_.pmap());
176  std::shared_ptr<BinaryEvalImpl_> self = shared_from_this();
177  typename pmap_interface::const_iterator it = left_.pmap()->begin();
178  const typename pmap_interface::const_iterator end = left_.pmap()->end();
179 
180  if (left_.is_dense() && right_.is_dense() && TensorImpl_::is_dense()) {
181  // Evaluate tiles where both arguments and the result are dense
182  for (; it != end; ++it) {
183  // Get tile indices
184  const size_type source_index = *it;
185  const size_type target_index =
186  DistEvalImpl_::perm_index_to_target(source_index);
187 
188  // Schedule tile evaluation task
189  TensorImpl_::world().taskq.add(
190  self,
191  &BinaryEvalImpl_::template eval_tile<left_argument_type,
192  right_argument_type>,
193  target_index, left_.get(source_index), right_.get(source_index));
194 
195  ++task_count;
196  }
197  } else {
198  // Evaluate tiles where the result or one of the arguments is sparse
199  for (; it != end; ++it) {
200  // Get tile indices
201  const size_type index = *it;
202  const size_type target_index =
203  DistEvalImpl_::perm_index_to_target(index);
204 
205  if (!TensorImpl_::is_zero(target_index)) {
206  // Schedule tile evaluation task
207  if (left_.is_zero(index)) {
208  TensorImpl_::world().taskq.add(
209  self,
210  &BinaryEvalImpl_::template eval_tile<const ZeroTensor,
211  right_argument_type>,
212  target_index, ZeroTensor(), right_.get(index));
213  } else if (right_.is_zero(index)) {
214  TensorImpl_::world().taskq.add(
215  self,
216  &BinaryEvalImpl_::template eval_tile<left_argument_type,
217  const ZeroTensor>,
218  target_index, left_.get(index), ZeroTensor());
219  } else {
220  TensorImpl_::world().taskq.add(
221  self,
222  &BinaryEvalImpl_::template eval_tile<left_argument_type,
223  right_argument_type>,
224  target_index, left_.get(index), right_.get(index));
225  }
226 
227  ++task_count;
228  } else {
229  // Cleanup unused tiles
230  if (!left_.is_zero(index)) left_.discard(index);
231  if (!right_.is_zero(index)) right_.discard(index);
232  }
233  }
234  }
235 
236  // Wait for child tensors to be evaluated, and process tasks while waiting.
237  left_.wait();
238  right_.wait();
239 
240  return task_count;
241  }
242 
243 }; // class BinaryEvalImpl
244 
245 } // namespace detail
246 } // namespace TiledArray
